COIDA Registration (Workman's Comp)

Essential protection for you and your staff. Mandatory for every employer in South Africa since 2020.

The Constitutional Court Ruling (2020)

In 2020, the Constitutional Court ruled that domestic workers are entitled to compensation for injuries on duty. This makes COIDA registration mandatory for all households employing staff.

What is Covered?

  • Medical expenses for workplace injuries.
  • Temporary disablement (paid time off).
  • Permanent disablement compensation.
  • Death benefits for dependents.

Employer Risk

If you are not registered, you can be held personally liable for all medical costs and loss of income if an employee is injured on your property.

Secure Your Compliance

We handle the registration with the Compensation Fund.
